Tension Mounts At NSAD Tension Mounts At NSAD

The Sole Administrator of Na- tional Sports Commission (NSC), Chief Olusola Rhodes sent jitters to membersofthe NationalSports Association for the Disabled (NSAD) as a result of his pro- nouncement on the embattled athletes last Friday in Lagos. The Sole Administrator of Na- tional Sports Commission (NSC), Chief Olusola Rhodes sent jitters to membersofthe NationalSports Association for the Disabled (NSAD) as a result of his pro- nouncement on the embattled athletes last Friday in Lagos.

"We know that we have done nothing wrong administering disabled sportso far, but if they say we should go, it's all well and good" a member of NSAD told PMsport.

Last Friday at the Sport City, the NSC Sole Administrator Chief Olusola Rhodes disclosed that the affairs of the disabled athletes comes atop his pri- orities.
